alert.note: Alert for Calcasieu (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 23 at 8:25AM CST until January 24 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Louisiana... Calcasieu River NEAR White Oak Park Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Monday morning at 830 AM CST. && ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING THROUGH MONDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Calcasieu River NEAR White Oak Park. * WHEN...Until early tomorrow afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 2.0 feet, Minor flooding of Goos Ferry Road will occur. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 6:35 AM CST Sunday the stage was 2.0 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 6:35 AM CST Sunday was 2.1 feet. - Forecast...The river will oscillate around flood stage with a maximum value of 2.0 feet tomorrow morning. - Flood stage is 2.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (6 am CST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Mon Tue Wed Calcasieu River White Oak Park 2.0 2.0 Sun 6 am CST 2.0 1.9 1.9 &&
